name: Rooting 4 U!
description:
A 2 player co-op game where you have to cheer together in the right pose and score as much points as you can!

Controllers only.

Move the left joystick to move the left arm.

Move the right joystick to move the right arm.

Press the right/left trigger to grab the ground or your partner!

Press the right/left joystick to lock your arm in place!
